title: The Pittsburgh Bessemer Steel Company
provenance_text:
William Coventry Wall [1810-1886], Pittsburgh, PA. Charles J. Rosenbloom [1898-1973], Pittsburgh, PA (Lugt Suppl. 633b), by February 1946 until April 1, 1973 [1]; his bequest to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1974.

Notes:
[1]. The painting, as "Homestead Mill near Pittsburgh," was included in the exhibition "Paintings and Prints from the Collection of Charles J. Rosenbloom" that was held at the museum in February-March 1946.
